alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Highland; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 9:24PM EDT until May 19 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... Brown County in southwestern Ohio... Southeastern Warren County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Southern Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Highland County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 924 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located from near Milford to near Amelia to near Neville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Milford, Hillsboro, Georgetown, Blanchester, Amelia, Mount Orab, Bethel, Williamsburg, Batavia, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Winchester, Marshall, Sardinia, Seaman, Belfast, Highland Holiday, Rocky Fork Point and Camp Dennison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Highland; Warren
